channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After disasters like the Texas flood, Trump reflexively blames Biden

item.title: Death toll from Texas flash floods rises to at least 108, officials say
item.description: Six people from a children's summer camp in Kerr County remain missing, officials said.

item.description: Texas flash floods kill at least 104, with dozens still missing; Amazon deploys its one millionth robot.

item.title: Hope of finding Texas flood survivors dims as search efforts go on
item.description: Hope of finding survivors of the catastrophic flooding in Texas is dimming a day after the death toll surpassed 100.

item.title: Passengers will no longer have to take their shoes off at the airport
item.description: TSA will allow passengers to keep their shoes on when they go through the general security line at many major airports across the country.

item.title: ICC issues arrest warrants for Taliban leaders over persecution of women and girls
item.description: The International Criminal Court has issued arrest warrants for two top Taliban leaders

item.title: What to know about deadly Texas floods "nobody saw" coming
item.description: Here's what to know about the deadly flooding, the colossal weather system that drove it and ongoing efforts to identify victims.
